title: ‘I’ve Had a Lot of Setbacks. I Finally Managed to Pull It Off’: Reactions to a Crazy, Chaotic Giro d’Italia Finale
content:
What the stars said: Top names try to make sense out of one of most gripping days in modern cycling history.

Read the full article at ‘I’ve Had a Lot of Setbacks. I Finally Managed to Pull It Off’: Reactions to a Crazy, Chaotic Giro d’Italia Finale on Velo.
author: sstokes
